result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: STC for 10/28/22 adjourned to 11/17/22 at 1:30 pm on court's motion; court unavailable on previously scheduled date.  Confirming email sent to parties.
Status conference on November 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Knapp.  Clerk. M.Burke.   State in victim rights compliance. Attorney Knap states that there has been a restitution request recently made and she needs to talk with the DE about that. She states that they are close to a resolution. STC set to 10/28/22 at 9:00.
Notice of assignment of judge returned. Return to sender. No such number. Unable to forward.

Attorney Emily Gaertner appeared for the State. Attorney Michelle M. Knapp in court with Defendant Ocyrus L Flowers.  Clerk: PU
  Atty Knapp requests an adjournment to review discovery with DE; no objection by the State.  Bond continues.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant, Ocyrus L Flowers, appeared with Attorney Michelle M. Knapp.  Attorney James Steven Kraus appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over to Br 2.  Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Branch 2 Scheduling Order completed and given to Attorney.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

01:37 - 01:39 PM  
  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Michelle Knapp.  Clerk PT  Preliminary Hearing set on  3/18/22 @ 10am before Comm , 927-54th Street, Room 157, Kenosha, WI  Bond is continued.    jk

records.addlTxt: Status conference on March 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Ocyrus L Flowers, appeared.  Attorney Alexandra Kathleen Smathers appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
